text: Gondiswil (Dialect: Gumiswil) is a municipality in the administrative district of Oberaargau in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. ==Gallery== File:2012-03-01-Supra Argovio (Foto Dietrich Michael Weidmann) 031.JPG|Protestant church, municipality and Post Office of Gondiswil File:2012-03-01-Supra Argovio (Foto Dietrich Michael Weidmann) 045.JPG|Gondiswil ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of Gondiswil Category:Municipalities in Oberaargau
title: Gondiswil
